django.core.files.uploadedfile
==============================

.. py:module:: django.core.files.uploadedfile

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Classes representing uploaded files.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.files.uploadedfile.UploadedFile
   django.core.files.uploadedfile.TemporaryUploadedFile
   django.core.files.uploadedfile.InMemoryUploadedFile
   django.core.files.uploadedfile.SimpleUploadedFile


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: UploadedFile(file=None, name=None, content_type=None, size=None, charset=None, content_type_extra=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.core.files.base.File`


   An abstract uploaded file (``TemporaryUploadedFile`` and
   ``InMemoryUploadedFile`` are the built-in concrete subclasses).

   An ``UploadedFile`` object behaves somewhat like a file object and
   represents some file data that the user submitted with a form.


   .. py:attribute:: size
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: content_type
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: charset
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: content_type_extra
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: name


.. py:class:: TemporaryUploadedFile(name, content_type, size, charset, content_type_extra=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`UploadedFile`


   A file uploaded to a temporary location (i.e. stream-to-disk).


   .. py:method:: temporary_file_path()

      Return the full path of this file.



   .. py:method:: close()


.. py:class:: InMemoryUploadedFile(file, field_name, name, content_type, size, charset, content_type_extra=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`UploadedFile`


   A file uploaded into memory (i.e. stream-to-memory).


   .. py:attribute:: field_name


   .. py:method:: open(mode=None)


   .. py:method:: chunks(chunk_size=None)


   .. py:method:: multiple_chunks(chunk_size=None)


.. py:class:: SimpleUploadedFile(name, content, content_type='text/plain')

   Bases: :py:obj:`InMemoryUploadedFile`


   A simple representation of a file, which just has content, size, and a name.


   .. py:method:: from_dict(file_dict)
      :classmethod:


      Create a SimpleUploadedFile object from a dictionary with keys:
         - filename
         - content-type
         - content
